item.title: NCAR/CGD Hackathon Concludes
item.description: Last Wednesday June 5, was the last day of a 3-day hackathon hosted by the Climate & Global Dynamics (CGD) Group at NCAR and I wanted to share a few things that you should really know about with regarding why Python will be so important in your scientific research and computational future. THE LANDSCAPE AND HISTORY OF NCL AND FORTRAN A large proportion of the modeling and computation code written here at NCAR has been developed in NCL (NCAR Command Language) and FORTRAN.
